title: EPIC: Core Layouts
description: Build foundational page layouts: home, doc pages with typography, browse pages pattern. These are required before content migration.

title: Create home page layout with hero
description: Build home page (/) with hero section, features grid, and getting started section. Use layout: page for full custom design.

title: Create apps showcase layout
description: Build /apps landing page with app cards (Heimdall, Vulcan, SAF CLI). Similar to browse but with different card design.

title: EPIC: Core Pages
description: Main site structure: home page, framework pages, apps pages, docs structure and navigation.

title: EPIC: Content Migration
description: Get real data from saf-site-v4: copy YAML files, set up data loaders, generate individual detail pages.

title: Create framework page layout
description: Build framework pages (Plan, Harden, Validate, Normalize, Visualize). Use layout: doc with proper typography and prose styling.

title: Document browse page pattern
description: Document the browse page pattern we established: layout: doc, aside: false, full-width CSS in custom.css. This is the standard for all listing pages.

title: EPIC: Production Evaluation
description: Final decision: Is VitePress production-ready for SAF? Test build performance, bundle size, search quality, deployment strategy.

title: EPIC: Component Library Decision
description: Critical blocking decision: Reka UI vs Shadcn Vue. Reka UI required extensive manual styling (transparent backgrounds). Validate current fixes and decide on library before building more pages.

title: EPIC: Browse Pages
description: Content listing pages with filters and search: validation profiles, hardening profiles, standards. All use layout: doc with aside: false pattern.
